doc.title: Atentatat
doc.plot: In 1925 a group of the Military Center of the Bulgarian Communist Party blew up the church 'St. King (now ' St. Nedelya') in Sofia. As a result 150 people got killed and many more - injured. What aims did these people pursue? What should we call them today - mad, insane, terrorists, and idealists? It is time we realized the bitter truth that their aim was irrelevantly obscure.
